items.name: Collision IPA
items.desc:
A dank and juicy India Pale Ale, featuring a large dose of spelt malt and flaked oats, liberally hopped with Mosaic and Columbus.
440ml / 6.2% ABV
ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley, Spelt, Oats)
Unfiltered, unpasteurised - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Conflux Pale Ale
items.desc:
Conflux is our house Pale Ale, soft and tropical featuring flaked oats and a light touch of rye malt, liberally hopped with Citra and Azacca.
440ml / 4.8% ABV
ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley, Oats, Rye)
Unfiltered, unpasteurised - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Cosmic Ballet DIPA
items.desc:
Southern Hemisphere Double IPA hopped with fresh harvest Galaxy, Vic Secret and Enigma from Australia.
440ml / 8.0% ABV
Allergens: Gluten (Barley, oats, wheat) - Vegan Friendly

items.name: For Days Peach & Apricot Gose
items.desc:
Sour wheat ale brewed with 200L of peach and apricot puree, infused with sea salt and coriander seed. Brewed in collaboration with Howling Hops to celebrate our 4th Birthday.
440ml / 4.5% ABV
Allergens: Gluten (Barley, wheat) - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Hug It Out Hazelnut & Chocolate Stout
items.desc:
A luscious stout featuring hazelnut, cacao nibs and vanilla. Come on guys, let’s hug it out, if just metaphorically for now.
440ml / 6.7% ABV
Allergens: Gluten, barley, oats; Nuts, hazelnut - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Nocturne Oatmeal Porter
items.desc:
A full and silky Porter with liberal amounts of flaked oats and a complex blend of British and German roasted malts.
440ml / 5.0% ABV
ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley, Oats)
Unfiltered, unpasteurised - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Oscillate #3 IPA
items.desc:
An ever changing series of IPAs giving us the ideal platform to play with new techniques and ingredients. This is a juicy IPA hopped with Mandarina Bavaria, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe, fermented with a classic New England yeast strain.
440ml / 6.4% ABV
Allergens: Gluten, barley, wheat, oats - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Prinzen Lagerbier
items.desc:
Prinzen is the latest addition to our family of core/seasonal beers. A crisp, clean, and refreshing top-fermented Kölsch style lagerbier hopped with Huell Melon for a bit of extra fruitiness.
440ml / 4.6% ABV
HOPS: Huell Melon
MALT: Bamberg Pils, Best Chitt Malt
YEAST: Köln
ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley)

items.name: Ruska IPA
items.desc:
Juicy and aromatic IPA infused with Juniper berries and hopped with Azacca and Loral.
440ml / 6.0% ABV
Allergens: Gluten (Barley, oats, wheat), Juniper - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Unity Core Range Gift Pack
items.desc:
A perfect way to let someone know you’re thinking of them at this time of year - our three core beers and a beautiful glass to enjoy them in, all of course in a branded Unity gift box. Our Christmas gift set comprises:
1 x Conflux Pale Ale (4.8% ABV)
1 x Collision IPA (6.2% ABV)
1 x Prinzen Lagerbier (4.6% ABV)
1 x Branded Unity Willi Becher Glass
(3 x 440ml)
Allergens: Gluten: Barley, oats, wheat, spelt - Vegan Friendly
